message.raw:
Many improements to runviewer

Runviewer improvements:
 * Newly added channels appended to treeview in alphabetical order
 * Add empty datasets to initial plots, So that we don't plot massive amounts of data just before the resampling occurs.
 * Fixed issues where resample time range was in pixels, not in time units
 * modified resampling algorithm to have additional points for max/min feature. Number of time points should be one more than a multiple of three (one point for current value, one point for min, one point for max...repeated + final point).
 * Modified shot class to support caching of data better
 * Modified shot class to walk the connection table starting from the master pseudoclock (currently only parses the masterpseudoclock and direct output channels on the master pseudoclock)

Modified the resampling algorithm:
 * Resampling algorithm uses float64 (double) for added precision
 * Resampling algorithm should preserve features on both sides of sample points
 * Added Python version of resamling algorithm (__resample4 in main.pyw)

Added setup.py file to build c extension
message.html:
Many improements to runviewer

Runviewer improvements:
* Newly added channels appended to treeview in alphabetical order
* Add empty datasets to initial plots, So that we don't plot massive amounts of data just before the resampling occurs.
* Fixed issues where resample time range was in pixels, not in time units
* modified resampling algorithm to have additional points for max/min feature. Number of time points should be one more than a multiple of three (one point for current value, one point for min, one point for max...repeated + final point).
* Modified shot class to support caching of data better
* Modified shot class to walk the connection table starting from the master pseudoclock (currently only parses the masterpseudoclock and direct output channels on the master pseudoclock)

Modified the resampling algorithm:
* Resampling algorithm uses float64 (double) for added precision
* Resampling algorithm should preserve features on both sides of sample points
* Added Python version of resamling algorithm (__resample4 in main.pyw)

Added setup.py file to build c extension

message:
Many improements to runviewer

Runviewer improvements:
 * Newly added channels appended to treeview in alphabetical order
 * Add empty datasets to initial plots, So that we don't plot massive amounts of data just before the resampling occurs.
 * Fixed issues where resample time range was in pixels, not in time units
 * modified resampling algorithm to have additional points for max/min feature. Number of time points should be one more than a multiple of three (one point for current value, one point for min, one point for max...repeated + final point).
 * Modified shot class to support caching of data better
 * Modified shot class to walk the connection table starting from the master pseudoclock (currently only parses the masterpseudoclock and direct output channels on the master pseudoclock)

Modified the resampling algorithm:
 * Resampling algorithm uses float64 (double) for added precision
 * Resampling algorithm should preserve features on both sides of sample points
 * Added Python version of resamling algorithm (__resample4 in main.pyw)

Added setup.py file to build c extension
